title: GPA change for EC campus
content: I heard that the results were withdrawn for EC campus and announced again with an increase in SGPA. Is this true? Is it for all the branches? Was there any discrepancy or were the marks just very bad?

comments.body:
Yeah they did that for them. Everyone got a .5 to 1 increase

Wtf is this ec campus supremacy
Oh wow, why can't they do it for RR too?!?!
Because you got the correct marks, everyone's marks here were very low as it wasn't correct
Nah there was like a legit discrepancy, people who usually get 9 ended up with a 7 or 8
That happened in rr campus too right

exactly.

they made it such that almost everybody scored an a or a b, but almost nobody scored an S

in my strong subjects i should've gotten an S but got an A.
